name: UfoTofU
description:
Perfectly puzzling palindromic patterns.

A retro-styled puzzler.

A game that respects you and your intelligence, and lets you take your time.

Originally released on the Android Play store in 2017. It may no longer exist there, so instead you can download it to your Android phone.

Music by Aemyn Connolly: https://twitter.com/aemyn
